abstract: Afghanistan's Pres Ashraf Ghani pledges crackdown on rampant sexual abuse of boys, and says pedophiles will be prosecuted no matter who they are; practice has been ritualized at parties and is rife among wealthy and prominent men, including military leaders; abuse is creating tensions with American service personnel who have witnessed exploitation and are frustrated nothing has been done to stop it.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ghani said the authorities would prosecute pedophiles no matter who they were, but many are Afghan commanders or powerful backers of the government.

headline.main: Ashraf Ghani, Afghan President, Vows to Crack Down on Abuse of Boys
headline.print_headline: Afghan President Vows to Crack Down on Sexual Abuse of Boys
